title: Create a migration workflow
description: Creates a migration workflow in the BigQuery Migration Service. A migration workflow is the primary resource that orchestrates a migration from a source data warehouse to BigQuery by defining the tasks to be executed.

objective.narrative: A developer migrating a data warehouse to BigQuery must first create a migration workflow. This workflow is the primary, top-level resource in the BigQuery Migration Service that contains and orchestrates all the individual migration tasks. It provides a structured way to manage the entire migration process, from translation to execution, for a source system such as Teradata.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2alpha_migrationservice_migrationworkflow_create
regionTags.title: Create a migration workflow
